column1: What is something you are grateful for today?
What’s the best thing that’s happened to you in the last 24 hours?
How have you made someone’s day better in the last week?
What could happen this week that would make you happier?
What are you most looking forward to right now?
What would be the best gift you could receive today?
What is the best way to start your morning?
What are you most proud of at work this week?
What would your best friend say your best quality is?
If you were Walt Disney, what would change about Disneyland?
You invented the next smart phone, what did you differently?
What movie would make a great theme park and why?
You have a one-way ticket to anywhere in the world, where do you go?
You just won the lottery, where do you spend the money?
You can have everything you ever wanted from one store, what store?
You could be on any reality show, which would you choose?
You get to make a new law, what would it be?
You get to have lunch with anyone (dead or alive) who would it be?
If you could only be one age for the rest of your life, what would it be?
What product do you wish was invented and available today?
What movie would you change the ending and how would you change it?
If you woke up tomorrow as an animal, what animal would you choose to be and why?
Are you sunrise, daylight, twilight, or night? Share why you picked your time of day?
If you could choose your age forever, what age would you choose and why?
If you could be in the movie of your choice, what movie would you choose and what character would you play?
If you could meet any historical figure, who would you choose and why?
If you were a city, which city would you choose to be and why?
What are your top 3 favorite foods?
If you could only eat one candy bar for the rest of your life, what would it be?
If you were to change your name, what name would you adopt going forward? Why?
Are you spring, summer, fall, or winter? Please share why.
If you were stranded on a desert island, what three items would you want to have with you?
Share a description of your favorite material object that you already own?
What item that you don't have already, would you most like to own?
If you could only choose one vacation destination where would you pick and why?
If you were to create a slogan for your life, what would it be?
Pick something out of your pocket or on your desk and share with the group why it's important to you.
If you could, which two animals of any kind would you mix together to create a new species?
If you could rename the Earth, what would you call it?
What new flavor of ice cream would you create?
What subject would you want taught in school that isn’t already?

If you could have an endless supply of any food, what would you get?
If you were an animal, what would you be and why?

If you could be anyone else in the world for a day, who would you be?

If you could go back in time and change history, what would you change? Why?
If the entire world could hear you right now for 30 Seconds, what would you say?
If you had to work but didn’t need the money, what would you choose to do?
